name: Participation and membership in the Western Governors University and other educational consortia
text: [§304A-117]  Participation and membership in the Western Governors University and other educational consortia.  The board of regents may participate in and perform any act related to membership in an educational consortium involving other institutions or jurisdictions that advances the instruction, research, or service mission of the university, including the Western Governors University. [L 2006, c 75, pt of §2]
